name: Giants Uprising
description:
Choose between different types of Giants – they differ in appearance, weaponry, and abilities. Produce weapons, upgrade your equipment, and consistently increase your skill level to put an end to humanity once and for all! Use fists, clubs, crossbows, shields, and swords. Crush people with the strength of your mighty stomp. Raze settlements, villages, and towns to the ground. Hunt for wild animals and breed cattle to satisfy your hunger and strengthen your power. Collect the raw materials and diamonds needed to improve your equipment and skills. Take revenge on the treacherous human race!



As a giant you suddenly awake from 200 years of numbness. Slowly you start to discover what the human race has done on the historical land of your ancestors. You look around the ravine where you once lived. The first thing that strikes you almost immediately is the fact that on the once-pristine lands of your territory, numerous settlements and cities have appeared. And what’s worse, most of your Giant brothers are gone.

Go on a quest to find your companions. Find out what happened to your kind. Reclaim your land and show the humans the power of a Giant’s wrath!



- Experience the thrill of being a powerful, fearless giant who crushes everything that stands in his way;

- Terrify and destroy in Arcade Mode or show who’s the most powerful of the Giants by fighting epic battles against your friends;

- Choose from different Giants – they differ in appearance, weapons, and skills;

- Create your own gear, and gain experience and new skills so you can carry out your plans at the right moment;

- Hunt for wild animals and breed cattle to satisfy your hunger and increase your strength;

- Collect the raw materials and diamonds needed to improve your equipment and skills;

- Discover a fantastic medieval world enriched with an atmospheric soundtrack!
